ai-patthana24.19:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.19:1.1_0: Nor has a reason for speaking the teaching.
ai-patthana24.19:3.1_0: It doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana24.19:4.1_0: Nor does he have a refuge for the teaching ...
ai-patthana24.19:4.1_1: Nor is a cause of refuge to the teaching ...
ai-patthana24.19:5.1_0: the teaching doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana24.19:6.1_0: the teaching doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
ai-patthana24.19:6.1_1: (This is the same as the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.19:7.1_0: There is no cause or condition for form.
ai-patthana24.19:7.1_1: Nor has form made by death, and it arises conditioned by form.
ai-patthana24.19:8.1_0: Nor does one who has gone for refuge to the teaching and the Saṅgha.
ai-patthana24.19:8.1_1: Nor does one who has gone for refuge to the teaching and the Saṅgha.
ai-patthana24.19:9.1_0: There is no cause or condition for refuge.
ai-patthana24.19:9.1_1: (This is the same as the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana24.19:10.1_0: It’s not the supreme cause or condition for refuge to with the world that gives rise to heaven.
ai-patthana24.19:11.1_0: Nor is for refuge to the teaching and for some other reason.
ai-patthana24.19:12.1_0: Nothing for refuge to the teaching and the Saṅgha, there is no cause or reason for anyone else.
